sentences.sContent: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.sCn: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.sContent: ...Beijing will punish those who violate the emission-reduction regulations more severely...

remMethod.val: 发音像“why late” → 迟到违反制度 → 违反， 违背

words.tran: 易受侵犯的；可亵渎的；可违反的
违反；妨碍，侵害；违背；强奸

trans.tranOther: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc
